VR UI Kit: Material Design System
$6.99 via Unity AssetStore

VR UI Kit: Material Design System is a library of common UI components such as buttons, tabs, menus, control bars, etc., design specifically for use in VR applications.

Although this is built for Oculus and Gear VR, you can make modifications and use it for any platform, including non-VR related apps.

$6.99 via Unity AssetStore

$4.99 via Unity AssetStore

Get a quick start building your VR app with our VR Lobbies Starter Pack!

Inside are four beautiful abstract environments, the perfect lobbies for the menus and settings scenes in your VR application.
